alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wyandotte, south central Leavenworth, northern Johnson, northwestern Cass and southwestern Jackson Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Leawood, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Olathe, Shawnee, Lenexa, Leawood, Grandview, Belton, Prairie Village, Raymore, Merriam, Mission, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Basehor, Edwardsville, Fairway, Mission Hills, Westwood, Lake Quivira and Kansas City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 410 and 417. Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 219 and 234. Interstate 635 between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 470 between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 435 between mile markers 0 and 15, and between mile markers 69 and 83. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 218 and 226. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
